_sText:
UPDATE1
___________________________________________-
Well, i really didn't supose anyone would like it, but probably everyone does, so here's the new file wich conatains 3 different mines, wone will make you type the command "kill" one "disconnect" and one ""say im a retard and stupid-I trapped on a mine!" 

REAME:

Thanks for downloading Landmine V2! The first version whas a little bit different, wich only
included one landmine, this one contains 3!

landmine 1: You will automaticly disconnect with the "disconnect" command.
landmine 2: you will automaticly kill yourself with the "kill" command.
landmine 3: you will automaticly say: Im a retard and stupid - i trapped on a mine!.

I hope you enjoy them! If you're not sure wich mine is wich one, then open up hammer and look at the names,
they will be named like: disconnect, say im a retard etc. and kill.

Ivar van Wooning
----------------------------------------------------------

Well, my first prefab, This is a Very Naughty landmine, if you hit it, you will automaticly disconnect from the server! have fun with it, and use it in your map, and give me a credit pls :) well, i woukld say: take a look at my maps!

Please if you like it, give me a high mark! :)
